name: Mental Abyss
description:
Have you ever felt like you’re going insane at your local office job? You feel like you’re slowly circling towards a mental state of insanity - almost as if you could converse with yourself?

Rest assured, you’re not alone.

In this game you’re playing as a burnt out aspiring man, devoid of any drive towards living a happy life. He’s not very pleased as he wakes up only to find out that he has been napping away at his desk during his 9-5 job finding himself being the last person in the department still there.

His way home turns into a spectacular exploration to the depths of his (cold and lifeless) mind. As you’re plummeting to the bottom of his imagination you’re going to find out what’s left of this once so sparkling, happy and caring young man.
